thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 34 of 3060
thread.title: frank

author: frank
title: frank
text: Great website and mobile app. However, if you change your booking by e.g. extending by one day, Rentalcars have a tendency not to tell you that by doing so, your car hire supplier has been changed. This means you can go to the car hire desk at e.g. Enterprise and they will have no record of your booking. The reality might be that your booking was changed to Europcar 5km away!!
